channel.title: Schemas on Brick Schema
channel.description: Recent content in Schemas on Brick Schema

item.title: Schema version 1.0.2
item.description: Schema Files (Turtle format) Brick TagSets: Entity classes with a hierarchy. Major component of Brick. E.g., Temperature_Sensor is a subclass of Sensor Brick Relationships: Brick relationships and meta-structure constructing TagSets with Tags. E.g., sensor1 is a point of vav1. Brick Tags: Tags are subcomponents of all TagSets. E.g., Temperature_Sensor consists of Tempearture and Sensor. Brick Dimensions: Information dimensions of TagSets.
